EXTRACTED VALUE: Steve Blake hit three 3-pointers for 10 points and three assists off the bench in Tuesday's win over the Rockets.
Jonny Flynn (hip surgery) is expected to play for Sioux Falls of the D League on Friday in preparation for a return next week.
James Posey returned to action from the flu on Wednesday and had five points in 19 minutes.
Ron Artest played just 21 minutes on Sunday, finishing a win over Golden State with two points, three assists, two steals, and two blocks.
